data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes, Sonia Maria, Silva, Leonardo De Oliveira Cardoso Da (2013): A new species of Dendroblatta Rehn, 1916 from northern Brazil (Blattaria: Ectobiidae) collected in wasp nests. Zootaxa 3599 (6): 597-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3599.6.9
